amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the United States International Trade Commission by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce appropriations for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) by $2 million, and increase appropriations for the International Trade Commission by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the English (PA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 83 - 342 (Roll no. 724).
